name: User can unarchive a public channel
precondition:
Important

Ensure that `Allow users to view archived channels` is enabled on the server and some public and private archived channels exist
(Setting can be found in System Console under "Users and Teams")

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Wednesday, December 16, 2020 12:22 PM
• Moved the test case to the QA only pool as it requires a system admin to perform the test
• Change made thanks to comments left in this test execution

inline.description:
User can unarchive a public channel
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. As a system admin archive a public channel:
    1. Click or tap channel name to open menu (Info on RN apps)
    2.  Click or tap Archive Channel
    3. Click Archive or tap Yes to confirm archiving the channel
  2. View the archived channel, noting that it is read-only
  3. Unarchive the channel:
    1. Click or tap channel name to open menu (Info on RN apps)
    2. Click or tap Unarchive Channel
    3. Click Archive or tap Yes to confirm unarchiving the channel
inline.expectedResult:
• Channel is no longer read-only
  • Channel is displayed in LHS with the normal icon, not an archived channel icon

customFields.Related ticket(s):
[HW Candidate] Mobile: Add "Unarchive Channel" option to the channel info screen — MM-20804
[HW Candidate] Web/Desktop: Add "Unarchive Channel" option to archived channels menu — MM-12330
